alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 11 at 2:43PM MDT until October 11 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning in effect for portions of the area today until 7 PM MDT... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228 AND 229... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 228 and 229. * Winds...West 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo
